item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Wednesday, October 30, 2024 at 6:40 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Australia/Lord_Howe is the weirdest timezone (6 points | discuss)

24. Digging into PlantStudio, a Bit Late (120 points | 24 comments)
25. Scythe Works Without Borders (68 points | 31 comments)
26. Programming a computer for playing chess (1950) [pdf] (101 points | 27 comments)

28. Ancient Monkey: Pwning a 17-Year-Old Version of SpiderMonkey (86 points | 6 comments)
29. InspectMind AI (YC W24) Is Hiring ( | hide)
